SETTINGS_FOLDER_DESC: Define a default folder to search for images. If left empty, it will search the entire vault.
SETTINGS_ENABLE_DEFAULT_DESC: If disabled, only notes that define a banner in their frontmatter will show one.
SETTINGS_DEFAULT_BANNER_IMAGE_DESC: The image to use when a note does not specify its own.
SETTINGS_DEFAULT_MOBILE_HEIGHT_DESC: The CSS height for banners on mobile devices (e.g., "150px").
SETTINGS_ENABLE_DEFAULT_HEADER_TEXT_DESC: If enabled, the default header text will be shown on notes that do not specify one.
SETTINGS_ENABLE_DEFAULT_HEADER_ICON_DESC: If enabled, the default icon will be shown on notes that do not specify one.
SETTINGS_DEFAULT_HEADER_TEXT_DESC: Text that will appear on the banner. Use {{title}} for the note's name.
SETTINGS_HEADER_FALLBACK_DESC: If the header uses a {{property}} that is not in the note, this frontmatter property will be used as an alternative. If empty or it also fails, the original template tag is shown.
SETTINGS_DEFAULT_HEADER_ICON_DESC: An emoji or the ID of an Obsidian icon (e.g., "lucide-info").
SETTINGS_HEADER_TITLE_SIZE_DESC: The CSS font size for the header text.
SETTINGS_HEADER_ICON_SIZE_DESC: The CSS font size for the header icon/emoji.
SETTINGS_HEADER_DECOR_DESC: Adds a visual effect to the text and icon to improve legibility.
SETTINGS_SHOW_IN_EMBEDS_DESC: Enable this to show banners in embedded notes.
SETTINGS_SHOW_IN_POPOVERS_DESC: Enable this to show banners in popover previews.
SETTINGS_EMBED_HEIGHT_NAME: Banner height in embeds and popovers
SETTINGS_EMBED_HEIGHT_DESC: The default height for banners in these contexts. The note's "_height" property still has priority.
SETTINGS_TAG_BANNERS_DESC: Define specific banners for notes containing a certain tag. Drag the rules to change their priority (top one wins).
SETTINGS_CONVERSION_TOOL_DESC: Opens a tool to search the entire vault and convert banners with [[wikilink]] or ![[wikilink]] format to plain string format.
MODAL_CONVERSION_DESC: BACKUP YOUR VAULT BEFORE CONTINUE! This tool will search your entire vault and convert banner properties with [[wikilink]] or ![[wikilink]] format to a plain string format. This action modifies your files and cannot be undone.
ERROR_NO_CONTAINER: Banner Plugin: Could not find the note container to inject the banner.
ERROR_INVALID_LOCAL_IMAGE: The local image path is not valid: "{0}"
ERROR_SAVING_POSITION: Error saving banner position in the frontmatter of {0}:
